backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping high-level Valentine experience features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of major frontend components and scenes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining Valentine-themed OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, preloading themed assets, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing proposal/celebration scenes, background effects, confetti, music, and transitions.
frontend/src/components/audio/MusicContr: Floating control panel for playing, pausing, and muting looping romantic background music.
frontend/src/components/effects/Floating: Canvas animation rendering continuously drifting floating hearts with resize-aware behavior.
Effect that spawns upward-floating love emojis at random intervals, disabled for reduced-motion users.
frontend/src/components/effects/HeartBur: Canvas effect generating a brief burst of animated heart particles from a click point.
frontend/src/components/effects/HeartCon: Canvas component that animates falling, rotating heart-shaped confetti for ~180 frames.
frontend/src/components/effects/PointerH: Canvas effect that draws fading heart shapes following pointer movement, disabled when reduced-motion is preferred.
frontend/src/components/effects/SparkleO: Full-screen canvas that animates twinkling sparkles with pulsing opacity.
frontend/src/components/TeasingMessageTo: Toast component that displays playful messages with bounce-in animation at fixed screen positions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that returns true if the user prefers reduced motion via media query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and custom CSS variables defining a Valentine-themed color system and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/scenes/CelebrationScene.tsx: Scene showing celebratory text and a glowing framed photo with Valentine-themed styling.
frontend/src/scenes/ProposalScene.tsx: React scene that renders the Valentine proposal UI with YES/NO buttons, teasing messages, evasive NO-button behavior, and global click heart-burst effects.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, themes, and plugins for romantic styling, animations, and custom UI tokens.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s purpose, features, requirements, assets, and overall build plan for the Valentine proposal experience.
